Marketing Manager, Zaltbommel, fulltime, , De functie, Als Marketing Manager vergroot je onze merk en productbekendheid in de hospitality, cruise en project markt in Europa en daarbuiten Je analyseert marktontwikkelingen in deze markten en identificeert groeimogelijkheden Je bent verantwoordelijk voor het ontwikkelen en inzetten van campagnes en creatieve programmas gericht op architecten, designers, installateurs, bouwbedrijven en hoteleigenaren, die belangrijk bijdragen aan de omzet Je werkt nauw samen met sales, brand management en product management Je rapporteert aan de Managing Director van de BU Coram Hospitality  Projects, , , , , Onze ideale kandidaat beschikt over een relevant , heeft een van op het gebied van en in en begrip van de dynamiek van en  Daarnaast is het een pre als je een aantal jaren marketingervaring hebt in de hospitality enof projectmarkt Ben je een teamspeler en beschik je daarnaast over uitstekende communicatieve vaardigheden, ben je creatief, energiek en gepassioneerd over het maken van impactvolle marketingcampagnes En ben je internationaal georinteerd en genteresseerd in design en reizen, ondernemend, handson en een zeer gemotiveerde zelfstarter, die anderen in beweging weet te krijgen Dan is ons wensenlijstje compleet, , , , , Coram is gespecialiseerd in het ontwerpen, ontwikkelen en produceren van kwalitatieve badkamerproducten, die eenvoudig te installeren zijn Coram streeft naar een marktpositie in de top tien van grootste spelers in Europa op basis van sterke merken, innovatief design en intensieve samenwerking met business partners Onze merken Tiger, Sealskin, Geesa en Impey worden verkocht via verschillende verkoopkanalen Coram is eigendom van een Nederlandse familie, , , , , , Een leuke uitdagende functie in een enthousiast team, bij een markt leidende speler op de badkamerartikelen en sanitair markt, met grote ambities, , , Mail dan je sollicitatie met cv naar  Kijk voor meer informatie over de organisatie op

alles merk je dat deze organisatie in de top behoort van de branche waarin zij werkzaam zijn De werklocatie ligt in de omgeving Drechtsteden, Vanwege uitbreiding zijn wij voor onze opdrachtgever op zoek naar een Marketing Manager met ervaring Je hebt ervaring in het sparren met grote retailers zoals Albert Heijn en bent bekend in de foodindustrieIn de functie van Marketing Manager ben je verantwoordelijk voor de ontwikkeling van het assortiment op de 4 Ps uit de marketing mix, in nauwe samenwerking met categoriemanagement de grote retailer Albert Heijn Hierbij ben jij de sparringpartner op het gebied van ontwikkeling en samenstelling van het assortiment, verpakkingen en innovaties Je levert graag een bijdrage aan het verhogen van de consumptie van de duurzame producten Je bouwt op basis van verzamelde trends, markt en klantinzichten aan een assortiment dat aansluit op de wensen van de consument Als Marketing Manager begeleidt je innovatieve trajecten van idee tot introductie op de winkelvloer Je ondersteunt Albert Heijn met content creatie voor hun mediakanalen en organiseert events Binnen deze functie schakel je intern met de afdelingen inkoop, verpakken, kwaliteit en productie om jouw projecten te ontwikkelen en implementeren, , , , , Mocht je willen solliciteren op deze vacature, kan dat door te klikken op de solliciteren button Voor vragen kan je contact opnemen met Rachelle Stippel via of via  Meer weten over onze werkwijze of benieuwd naar andere vacatures binnen de food sectoren Bezoek onze website Vanuit onze vestigingen in Ridderkerk en Ede bemiddelen wij dagelijks personeel op ieder functieniveau in heel Nederland Door onze specialisatie in de food hebben wij hierin een groot netwerk en een breed scala aan vacatures Door te solliciteren via van nes  plaisier, heb je een voorsprong op de concurrentie Wij sturen namelijk niet alleen jouw CV, maar vertellen ook wie jij bent en waarom jij geschikt bent voor de vacature Daarnaast kennen wij onze opdrachtgevers goed en geven jou dus waardevolle informatie over het bedrijf die een directe sollicitant niet heeft Ook zullen wij altijd kijken of er nog andere vacatures bij jou kunnen passen ook vacatures die niet online staan Door n sollicitatie te versturen, solliciteer je dus eigenlijk op veel meer functies Mits je dit uiteraard zelf wilt, , Gestelde eisen, , Voor de volledige vacature klik op de sollicitatiebutton Je wordt doorgestuurd naar een externe website

The Marketing  Communications Manager is responsible for the development, planning and execution of the local Marketing  Communication strategy Your main objective is to build greater knowledge and recognition of the TSystems brand externally and internally The local Marketing  Communication strategy is directly connected with the Global Marketing strategy and thats why you intensively collaborate with TSystems International on a daily basis You are the linking pin between Global Marketing, TSystems in the Netherlands and the local Marketing team, , You are proactive, innovative and bring creative solutions to questions from the business Furthermore stakeholder management comes naturally to you You advice and support stakeholders in the area of Marketing and Corporate Communications to ensure that all internal  external messages are aligned, , Job Responsibilities

About Us, , MessageBird is transforming the communications landscape as one of the fastestgrowing software companies in the world Our cloud communications platform makes it possible for businesses to instantly connect with over 7 billion phones globally, allowing them to speak with their customers in the same ways they talk to their friends, , Our suite provides access to all major messaging channels, from SMS and Voice to WeChat, Messenger, Facebook, WhatsApp and more We provide outofthebox solutions with our own applications like Inbox and Flow Builder, plus a robust set of APIs that simplify workflows and automation, , With over 20,000 customers  including some of the worlds biggest brands like Facebook, Deliveroo, Uber and WhatsApp  its likely that youve benefited from MessageBirds omnichannel technology at some point For small and midsized businesses, we also offer support and solutions through an Online SelfServe OSS dashboard, , Our global team is a powerhouse of 350 employees, who work across eight international offices We are excited that youre here and interested to, , How we work, , We work fast, grow fast, and build fast Life at MessageBird moves in fastforward motion Were a team that focuses on making an impact  right from day one We are gogetters, industry leaders, and dreamers Risk takers Rollupyoursleevesandmakeithappen kind of people We thrive on transparency, and we value solutionminded attitudes, , We are all driven by one ethos Get Shit Done We love shaping things together and leveraging different perspectives, because that makes our products better Our Birds are empowered with freedom and opportunity in return, we expect honesty, courage, and agility We own our work, and sometimes we fail And then we get back up and cross the finish line  together as a team Sound refreshing We think so, too, , The Role Head of Performance Marketing, , You will take full responsibility for charting a strategy, building processes and maintaining reporting of all performance channels that drive user action Managing a team of Performance Marketing Managers who ensure the acceleration of our growth through marketing acquisition as well as defining and executing the team strategy You maintain a continuous focus on ROI while experimenting with new channels, campaigns and technology, , What youll do, , , , What youll bring, , , , Psst  some added perks, , , , If you think youre a match for this role and can bring some great skills to the MessageBird team, please apply Were excited to get to know you, , Read MessageBirds Recruitment Privacy Statement

The future of work demands two major workforce changes from organisations  upskilling current staff so they may gain new skills in their current role, and reskilling staff to help them develop new capabilities and take on entirely new roles The current COVID19 sanitary crisis and all the uncertainty it has caused only expedites the need for companies to reskill and upskill their workers, so they may have a chance of bridging the skills gap and remaining competitive

Company Description, , Bynder is awardwinning marketing software that allows brands to easily create, find and use content, such as documents, graphics and videos More than 150,000 brand managers, marketers and creatives use Bynders brand portals every day to collaborate globally, produce, review and approve new marketing collateral, and circulate company content at the click of a button Brands using Bynder go to market faster and achieve endtoend brand consistency across all channels and regions, with simplified collaboration across the organization, , Founded in 2013 by CEO Chris Hall, Bynder is established globally with headquarters in Amsterdam and offices across the Netherlands, UK, US, Spain and UAE, , , , A  is responsible for the timely and complete implementation of Bynder for our customers, ,  Our customers all use the same Bynder DAM but we configure and implement accounts based on the specific needs and processes of each individual customer In order to do so we have to really understand the challenges our customers deal with on a daily basis, , , so its up to you to make sure they are happy with our services Your goal is to set our customers up for success and make them longtime Bynder advocates, ,  You take the customer by the hand and guide them through the entire implementation process You consult the customer on best possible solutions You are able to translate technical configurations into simple solutions, and vice versa You are a star in managing customers expectations and working with deadlines You have a strong helicopter view with regards to your projects and will not lose your eye for detail Lastly, we also depend on your input for our roadmap, helping us to shape the future of Bynder, , , Qualifications, , , , , Additional Information

Het team Markt en Communicatie is op zoek naar een ervaren en doortastende Manager die visie op zorginhoud weet te vertalen naar zorgverkoop en corporate communicatie, , Wat vinden we belangrijk, , Dat je in staat bent om commercieel en zakelijk inzicht te verbinden met visie op zorg en zorginhoud Je hebt oog voor de interne processen en externe ontwikkelingen binnen het vakgebied en de economische kant van de zorg Je bent iemand die proactief is, ontwikkelingen initieert en kansen voor de organisatie ziet Een gezonde dosis lef is jou niet vreemd en daardoor weet je deze kansen om te zetten in acties Het opbouwen van relaties en het uitbreiden van jouw netwerk is een vanzelfsprekendheid en zit je in het bloed, , Je kunt ook op inhoud een sparringpartner zijn, intern maar ook voor de financiers Je bent degene die strategische keuzes door weet te vertalen naar corporate communicatie en contractering van zorgcontracten Je bent hierbij eindverantwoordelijk voor het initiren van meerjarige afspraken met zorgkantoren, gemeenten, zorgverzekeraars en andere financiers Kortom jij bent eigenaar voor wat betreft het ontwikkelen en implementeren van visie, strategie en beleid ten aanzien van corporate communicatie en zorgverkoop, , Wij zijn volop in ontwikkeling en je wilt meebouwen aan de positioneringen en professionalisering van de veelzijdige zorg die wij als Cosis bieden Je hebt een visie op marketing en contractering, op communicatie en marktonderzoek, en je kunt deze uitdragen en overbrengen Op basis hiervan stel je ook prioriteiten Je geeft sturing en duidelijkheid Je werkt vanuit onze zorginhoudelijke visie en bent communicatief, bedrijfsmatig en analytisch sterk Jouw speerpunten zijn Klantgerichtheid, verbinding, marktpositie, margebeleid, profilering en communicatie in de breedste zin van het woord, , Wat moet je nog meer wetenDe manager Markt en Communicatie geeft leiding aan circa 18 medewerkers verdeeld over de disciplines, marketing en verkoop, contractering en onderaanneming, trend en marktonderzoek en communicatie Deze teams zijn volop in ontwikkeling en bezig om Cosis nog breder en beter op de kaart te zetten Als manager Markt en Communicatie rapporteer je rechtstreeks aan de Raad van Bestuur en maak je samen met je collegas managers onderdeel uit van het dagelijkse bestuur van het Cosis Service Centrum Je werkt samen met de directeuren om de zorgverkoop en de communicatie van Cosis te optimaliseren, , Het is van belang dat je je zowel mondeling als schriftelijk helder en eenduidig uitdrukt in het contact met het team, maar ook met externen Hierbij weet je jouw softskills op de juiste manier in te zetten Je bent faciliterendcoachend, oftewel neemt niet over zorgen dat in plaats van zorgen voor, waardoor de professionals, waaraan jij leiding geeft, kunnen groeien Je blijft wel altijd de stip aan de horizon zien, , Wat vragen we van je, , , , Wat hebben we jou te bieden, , , De benoeming geschiedt volgens de bepalingen van de caogehandicaptenzorg De functie wordt momenteel beschreven en gewaardeerd conform de FWG systematiek Nieuwe medewerkers moeten bij indiensttreding een Verklaring Omtrent het Gedrag VOG overhandigen De kosten hiervoor worden door Cosis vergoed, , Ben je benieuwd of Cosis aan sluit bij jou Lees over onze aantrekkelijke arbeidsvoorwaarden op de website, , Word jij onze nieuwe collega, , Als je genteresseerd en aantoonbaar gekwalificeerd bent, nodigen we je van harte uit om te solliciteren Stuur ons dan een motivatiebrief en cv We ontvangen je sollicitatie graag uiterlijk 14 december 2020, ter attentie van mevrouw drs FH Ria Stegehuis, voorzitter Raad van Bestuur Sollicitaties die we later ontvangen, kunnen we niet in behandeling nemen, , Je kunt solliciteren door hier te klikken Vul het formulier in en maak je account aan Mocht je nog vragen hebben over de vacature, dan kan je eveneens contact opnemen met mevrouw Stegehuis, telefoonnummer click apply Een assessment maakt deel uit van de procedure, , , , , Cosis helpt mensen met een verstandelijke enof psychische beperking grip te krijgen en houden op het leven Je komt ons tegen in Groningen en Drenthe Midden in de samenleving, voor korte of langere tijd en dicht bij de mensen die we helpen De bedoeling van onze organisatie is richtinggevend voor hoe wij ons dagelijkse werk doen Daarbij staat de samenwerking tussen clinten, het persoonlijk netwerk en de professional centraal Onze vakbekwame, professionele en bevlogen medewerkers schakelen onze dienstverlening op en af waar mogelijk of noodzakelijk Samen maken we kleine stappen om de opgestelde doelen te behalen

Company Name: Societe Generale Corporate and Investment Banking  SGCIB
Job Description: Responsibilities, , Your role, , You will answer to clients questions and requests on a daily basis supporting both sales and customer support teams, , , , , This VIE in Amsterdam is to begin as soon as possible but you need to plan 3 months between your application date and the beginning of your VIE assignment It will last 24 months, , The VIE is a specific contract, under Business Frances eligibility criteria, opened to candidates under 28 and from the member states of the European Economic Space Please see wwwciviwebcom, in order to have more details regarding your financial indemnities, , , , , , , , , , , , As soon as you arrive, you will be integrated into our teams and will learn every day alongside our experts, who will support you in your tasks Gradually, you will become more independent in your projects, making this experience a real career accelerator You will also discover all the diversity of our businesses, in a sector that is constantly evolving and innovating, , At the end of your VIE, various opportunities could be offered to you, in France and abroad, , At Societe Generale, we are convinced that people are drivers of change, and that the world of tomorrow will be shaped by all their initiatives, from the smallest to the most ambitious, , Whether youre joining us for a period of months, years or your entire career, together we can have a positive impact on the future Creating, daring, innovating and taking action are part of our DNA, , If you too want to be directly involved, grow in a stimulating and caring environment, feel useful on a daily basis and develop or strengthen your expertise, you will feel right at home with us, , , , You should know that our employees can dedicate several days per year to solidarity actions during their working hours, including sponsoring people struggling with their orientation or professional integration, participating in the financial education of young apprentices, and sharing their skills with charities There are many ways to get involved, , , , , , Socit Gnrale Global Banking  Investment Services SG GBIS is the investment banking arm of Socit Gnrale, one of the largest banking group in the Eurozone and a leading player in the European capital markets Combining innovation, quality of execution and local teams, SGCIB offers valueadded integrated financial solutions for its clients The Global Transaction Banking GTB business line is one of the major pillars of GBIS solutions, , The Payment and Cash Management activity, part of our GTB Division proposes solutions to treasurers of international and Dutch domestic companies and institutions, such as accounts, payment processing, cash pooling, electronic banking tools, foreign exchange, domestic guarantees, , You will part of the Sales team 5 people, in charge of developing the activity increase revenues and number of transactions processed The team members are Dutch and French and constantly interact with the Customer Support team 7 people

Job Summary, , The Red Hat Sales team is looking for an Inside Sales Representative to join us in Amsterdam, Netherlands In this role, you will work with experienced field sales account managers and a regional SAP business development manager to enable sales growth for new customers in the SAP market You will generate qualified leads for the sales account managers, help build pipeline, identify customer issues, gather their technology data, build attendance to marketing events, and allow the field sales account managers to focus on closing business Youll be responsible for outbound prospecting and will be measured by how effectively you move leads into appointments and the pipeline You will be tasked with meeting the demands of a new kind of buyer, who primarily lives online, behind the telephone, and is difficult to get to These buyers form opinions before speaking to vendors based on the information they uncover online, through crowdsourcing, or referrals Youll have to develop a deep understanding of their challenges and business in order to get their attention As an Inside Sales Representative, youll be an integral part of the sales team and our lead on the account Youll need to think and react quickly, as well as excel in having online conversations In addition, you should be a great content finder with a positive attitude and an ability to get attention and handle difficult interactions with ease, , , , , , , , , , Red Hat is the worlds leading provider of enterprise open source software solutions, using a communitypowered approach to deliver reliable and highperforming Linux, hybrid cloud, container, and Kubernetes technologies Red Hat helps customers integrate new and existing IT applications, develop cloudnative applications, standardize on our industryleading operating system, and automate, secure, and manage complex environments Awardwinning support, training, and consulting services make Red Hat a trusted adviser to the Fortune 500 As a strategic partner to cloud providers, system integrators, application vendors, customers, and open source communities, Red Hat can help organizations prepare for the digital future, , Red Hat is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and an affirmative action employer We review applications for employment without regard to their race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, age, veteran status, genetic information, physical or mental disability, medical condition, marital status, or any other basis prohibited by law, , Red Hat does not seek or accept unsolicited resumes or CVs from recruitment agencies We are not responsible for, and will not pay, any fees, commissions, or any other payment related to unsolicited resumes or CVs except as required in a written contract between Red Hat and the recruitment agency or party requesting payment of a fee, , , , Apply Apply, , Share, , Sorry the Share function is not working properly at this moment Please refresh the page and try again later, , Share on your newsfeed

We have an exciting opportunity for a Senior HR  Training Administrator to join our regional LD Team, , What are your main roles and responsibilities, , Based at one of manufacturing plants located in ThannFrance, BotlekNetherlands or StallingboroughUK, this role provides a full range of support services to the Regional LD function, Managers and Learners across all locations and work groups, , In this role, you will ensure the effective utilization and management of LD Systems in the region, the efficient planning and coordination of training activities and be responsible for the maintenance of accurate training records A key part of this role will also be the generation of timely and relevant data and the reporting and presentation of analytics to support management planning and decision making, , , , Provides Regional coordination and support for LD management and marketing, LD reporting and learning analytics, and management of relevant LD systems, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , To be considered for this role, you will have the following skills and experience, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , Competitive salary and benefits, such as a market competitive salary, a thirteenth month, a bonus scheme and 15 work time reduction days Besides that, we have a minimum of 25 vacation days and a pension scheme that is fiscal optimal Finally, we have flexible working hours and an informal working atmosphere, , , , Please apply for this position via our website or via the Watertalentnl website, , For more information or for questions about this vacancy or about our company, you can visit our website or contact, , Brenda Beckers  van Gelderen, Manager, Human Resources, Tel nr 310181 246 676

Hoe maak jij het verschil, , Als Marketing en Media Services MMS Specialist bij Wehkamp weet jij alles over hoe jij merken kan laten groeien bij Wehkamp Je zet, samen met de categories marketingplannen op die relevant zijn voor de klant, het merk en Wehkamp Het bewaren van die balans is essentieel voor succes in jouw vak Ook denk je na over nieuwe vormen van relevante marketingmogelijkheden voor merken op en rond ons platform, met altijd in ogenschouw nemend dat die oplossing schaalbaar is, , In de functie van MMSspecialist heb je een centrale positie binnen Wehkamp Je schakelt tussen campagne, product, content, marketing channels, buyers, finance en data Naar de merken toe ben je het uithangbord en autoriteit van Wehkamp op het gebied van marketing Je kunt jezelf verplaatsen in de challenges van een merk en die omvormen tot een succesvol marketingplan voor zowel Wehkamp, het merk, als onze klant, , , , , , , , , , Je vult je dag niet met activiteiten, maar je bepaalt jouw bijdrage op basis van impact Eigenaarschap en ondernemerschap zijn belangrijke voorwaarden om met elkaar te winnen, , Alsof Wehkamp jouw eigen bedrijf is, neem jij de LEAD Met als gevolg meer verantwoordelijkheid en een hele steile leercurve, ongeacht wat je nu al meebrengt, , , , Iedereen bij Wehkamp heeft zijn of haar eigen discipline In vele van onze disciplines blinken we inmiddels uit, door onze jarenlange ervaring in ecommerce Als organisatie zijn we inmiddels een forse scaleup We houden een startup mentaliteit door te pionieren en te blijven leren Samen experimenteren we op grote schaal, en maken we samen het verschil voor de klant, , , Samen blijven we voorop lopen, jij haalt het beste uit jezelf In een digitale organisatie moet iedereen blijven leren, want de wereld om ons heen verandert razendsnel Persoonlijke ontwikkeling heeft bij ons prioriteit en gaat hand in hand met het leveren van prestaties, , Groei is een journey, en leren doen we elke dag, , , We geven om onze klanten en we geven om elkaar Onze connectie is authentiek, gebaseerd op transparantie en vertrouwen Het beste uit jezelf halen werkt het makkelijkst als je helemaal jezelf kunt en durft te zijn Eigenlijk moet je het beleven om het te voelen Nieuwsgierig Reageer dan direct en maak kennis

products and modify existing designs, ensuring that deliverables are on time and with acceptable quality, , , , You will manage, coach and develop teams of Software Developers, ensuring successful business delivery while maintaining engineeringoperational excellence You will help define and implement organisational objectives and direction and be responsible for creation of new features with products and services, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , We value Diversity of all types and in an open, dynamic workplace This has been a pillar at Bookingcom since day one, and something we continue Description, , Amazon opened on the World Wide Web in July 1995 and today offers Earths biggest selection Amazon strives to be Earths most customercentric company, where customers can find and discover anything they might want to buy online By giving customers more of what they want  low prices, vast selection, and convenience  Amazoncom continues to grow and evolve as a worldclass ecommerce website Almost half of the sales come from our international businesses and our European retail business is a core part of that scale and growth Amazons presence in Europe is growing fast including operations in Germany, the UK, France, Italy, Spain and our EU headquarters in Luxembourg, , We are currently looking for a Manager to lead a Team of Brand Specialists in Amazon Vendor Services AVS Amazon Vendor Services are a suite of services designed to help Amazon Retails most strategic vendors grow and deliver the best customer experience by working across all key business levers eg selection, availability, operational efficiency, catalog quality, and marketing The service is delivered primarily through Account Managers assigned to specific vendors Amazon has an ambitious vision for the future of this service, focusing on business impact for vendors and the categories, operational scalability and vendor satisfaction, , As Sr Team Leader for Amazon Vendor Services, you will be responsible to deliver impact to a large group of strategic vendors, both directly and through a team of Brand Specialists reporting to you Your priority will be to deliver on our commitment to help vendors improve their performance across key retail metrics, ensure their satisfaction with the service and continuously improve the productivity of your team You will work in close collaboration with Vendor Managers to understand your vendors needs and define the right goals and targets You will meet the Category Leader and other Functional Leaders on a regular basis to get guidance and help them with strategic decision making Finally you will be expected to contribute to continuous enhancements and innovation within the service, , You should be passionate about managing and developing people, highly analytical, resourceful and customer focused You need to have a proven track record of delivering results in fastpaced and dynamic business environments while managing the sometimes conflicting needs of different groups of stakeholders, , Key responsibilities as a Sr Team Lead for AVS , , , , , , , ,  Amazon EU SARL Netherlands B, Job ID A1145944

The position, The last years our recruitment team has developed into a fully operational Talent Acquisition team in which passion, energy and ingenuity are key factors for success The team consists of a Manager Talent Acquisition, 2 Corporate Recruiters, a Campus Recruiter, 2 Recruitment Assistants and 2 flexstaff specialists at our FlexOord hiring desk We are jointly responsible for the entire recruitment process within our organization Van Oord recruits specific and often scarce technical talent Your added value lies in understanding who our target groups are, what moves them and developing a solid, tailormade recruitment and selection plan, , The responsibilities as a Senior Corporate Recruiter are versatile, so no two days are the same Together with hiring managers from various departments, you set up recruitment profiles, conduct selection interviews and advise the organisation on the entire recruitment and job offer process You are therefore responsible for the recruitment of candidates up to and including making job offers In addition to internal communication and coordination with regard to vacancies, you also ensure that vacancies are spread among the specific target groups, through effective sourcing and recruitment marketing You get energy from interacting with internal stakeholders, guiding the entire recruitment process and contributing to binding talent to Van Oord You are supported in this by a very strong employer brand and more than 4,500 ambassadors, , , , , , , , Working in an international, high demanding and dynamic organisation, with the possibility to truly have impact on our business, people and environment We offer a complete package with excellent secondary employment benefits The package includes among other things, , , , Van Oord is a leading global contractor in dredging, hydraulic engineering and offshore projects oil, gas and wind We are an innovative partner for our clients and have been contributing to the infrastructure of tomorrows world for over a hundred years Our people are committed, enterprising professionals with a passion for water and technology, , , Apply online for the job by using the button below If you have any further questions, please feel free to contact me for more information about the vacancy, , Do you like to know more about Van Oord and want to stay informed of other vacancies within Van Oord Climb aboard and follow us on LinkedIn , Instagram , Vimeo and Facebook , , Acquisition by agencies or interim candidates for this vacancy is not appreciated This vacancy it is not available on an interim basis, , , 31 88 8268599

Job Title: Inside Account Executive, Belux (French and Dutch speaking)
Job Description: We are looking for an Inside Account Executive to drive our technology and superserve our customers If you have a passion for technology and an interest in how it can impact large businesses we want to talk with you, , Youll drive the entire sales process from start to finish, including opportunity identification, introductory meetings, product demonstration and evaluation, customer QA, as well as negotiation and closing, , You will be joining a unique team People who succeed at Nutanix have a sense of urgency, a lot of initiative, a commitment to customer success, and enthusiasm about pushing the edge as well as a sense of humor We provide interesting work, great products, new things to learn, and the freedom to make the job work the way you like it, , Together, we will create the next iconic technology company and do extraordinary things So, if you are ready to do your best work and grow your career, come and join us, , , , Nutanix EMEA Inside Sales team is responsible for accelerating revenue growth This team is exposed to supporting functions like sales, marketing, channel and support within the organization as well as Nutanix customers, partners, distributors and alliances This team of 100 individuals is spread over the different hubs in EMEA, and consist of Sales Development Representatives, Inside Account Executives and Inside Channel Account Managers The teams unique vibe comes from the constant creativity, innovation and focus on how we can better serve our customers every time The EMEA Inside Sales team is a talent pool for other functions in the company, it is the ideal opportunity to get to know the Nutanix portfolio and accelerate your career, , , , , , , Does this sound like you Lets talk, , , , Founded in 2009 and headquartered in San Jose, California, Nutanix is a passionate team of 6000 employees worldwide Our people we call ourselves Nutants are the heartbeat of LifeAtNutanix and one of the many things that makes Nutanix a great place to work at We share an intellectual curiosity, a bias for action, and an obsession for our customers We are builders and problem solvers with an entrepreneurial spirit Above all, we celebrate what makes each of us unique, , We are humbled to be recognized as one of Bloombergs Top 50 Companies to Watch in 2020 and one of the Fortune 100 Best Companies to Work For 2020 , , Were growing fast and disrupting the computing industry Join us and make your mark, , , , Nutanix is a global leader in cloud software and a pioneer in hyperconverged infrastructure solutions, making computing invisible anywhere Companies around the world use Nutanix software to leverage a single platform to manage any app, at any location, at any scale for their private, hybrid and multicloud environments, , , , Nutanix is an Equal Employment Opportunity and in the US an Affirmative Action employer Qualified applicants are considered for employment opportunities without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, disability status or any other category protected by applicable law We hire and promote individuals solely on the basis of qualifications for the job to be filled, , We strive to foster an inclusive working environment that enables all our Nutants to be themselves and to do great work in a safe and welcoming environment, free of unlawful discrimination, intimidation or harassment, , As part of this commitment, we will ensure that persons with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodations If you need a reasonable accommodation, please let us know by contacting hrnutanixcom

Job Title: PhD Positions in Finance & Accounting at Erasmus Research Institute of Management (ERIM), Erasmus University Rotterdam (EUR)
Job Description: up to 5year fullyfunded projects  stateoftheart facilities, , About The PhD Positions Job Description, , Each year ERIM initiates and starts a substantial number of new and internationally oriented PhD research projects The focus is on pioneering and innovative research in the field of Management and Business Research, , ERIM distinguishes five areas of research in management and offers fully funded PhD research projects in the following fields Business Processes, Logistics and Information Systems LIS, Organisation ORG, Marketing MKT , Finance  Accounting FA, and Strategy  Entrepreneurship SE , , The Finance and Accounting programme aims to enhance understanding of the financial decisionmaking of firms, managers and market participants, as well as the functioning of financial markets and intermediaries, , The programme strives for highquality scientific contributions in all major areas of finance and accounting, and to disseminate its knowledge locally and internationally The three broad themes of the Finance and Accounting programme are asset pricing, corporate finance and accounting, , ERIM currently offers the following PhD projects within its FA research programme , , , , More information about ERIM PhD in Management programme can be found on , , , , To be considered for a PhD position in management at ERIM, you are expected to, , In addition to these formal requirements, candidates for the programme are selected on the basis of their CVs, academic references, and interviews with the potential supervisors, , , , Our PhD projects are fully funded and salaried positions, meaning that appointed PhD candidates are employees promovendi of Erasmus University Rotterdam EUR Salary and benefits are in accordance with the collective labour agreement for Dutch Universities CAONU Fixed, gross monthly salaries are  2,395 in the first year,  2,790 in the second year,  2,920 in the third year, and  3,061 in the fourth year EUR has attractive employment conditions , which include a holiday allowance of 8 per cent, an endofyear bonus of 83 per cent, and a generous number of vacation days, , Successful candidates are appointed on a fulltime basis for a duration up to five years The PhD position is intended to start , , PhD candidates also benefit from the stateoftheart research facilities and financial support programme ERIM Support Programmes  ESP, which ERIM set up for a wide range of researchrelated activities such as conference participation, international job markets, external courses, scientific and educational literature, visits to international supervisors, and international research studies, , , , All applicants are required to follow our online application process  The application deadline is, , , , ERIM Doctoral Office, , Email click apply, , , , ERIM is the research institute of management at Erasmus University Rotterdam, founded by Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University RSM and Erasmus School of Economics ESE, both of which excel in their research and teaching programmes The level and international character of their research and teaching programmes has put both schools at the forefront of academic excellence They offer a diversified portfolio of accredited teaching and research programmes, ranging from preexperience MSc to postgraduate Masters and executive development, and from fundamental research to applied research and business support, which are renowned throughout the world RSM is one of the few schools worldwide that holds a triple accreditation from the AMBAs, EQUIS and the AASCB, and is positioned among the top European business schools The scientific staff of both schools plays a major role in the schools interaction with the international business community, , ERIM distinguishes itself by the highlevel and international character of its research and has repeatedly been ranked among top 3 research institutes in Europe ERIMs key aims are topquality academic research with impact both on academia and managerial practice, and the advancement of international academic careers and highlevel support for both research and doctoral education For more information about ERIM please visit

How will you make an impact, , The purpose of this job is to support the process of selling our portfolio of exciting, innovative High End Transmission Electron Microscope HETEM solutions and peripheral modules By partnering with our Product Marketing Manager and Product Manager for HETEM as well as our Product Marketing EngineersPMEs and Sales Account Managers  the primary objective is to play a key role in articulating the value of our solutions to our own sales organization and our customers to drive growth in sales revenue  share of our TEM business within our Materials Science Business Unit, , , , , , , , , , , , Ideally this position would be located in Eindhoven, The Netherlands at our Thermo Fisher Scientific EM manufacturing and development facility, , Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc is the world leader in serving science, with annual revenue exceeding 25 billion Our Mission is to enable our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer Whether our customers are accelerating life sciences research, solving complex analytical challenges, improving patient diagnostics and therapies or increasing productivity in their laboratories, we are here to support them Our global team of more than 75,000 colleagues delivers an unrivaled combination of innovative technologies, purchasing convenience and pharmaceutical services through our industryleading brands, including Thermo Scientific, Applied Biosystems, Invitrogen, Fisher Scientific, Unity Lab Services and Patheon For more information, please visit wwwthermofishercom

Job Description: Wij zoeken een Support  Project Engineer voor Heerlen enof Rotterdam Onze opdrachtgever is een ambitieus no nonsense bedrijf dat wereldwijd opereert De basis ligt in de USA en inmiddels zijn er vestigingen in meerdere landen in ZuidAmerika, India, Maleisi en in de UK en Frankrijk In Nederland is er een vestiging in ZuidLimburg en in ZuidHolland, waarbij beide vestigingen nauw samenwerken en steeds op zoek zijn naar nieuw Talent om het bedrijf verder te laten groeien Zij leveren soft en hardware oplossingen voor de betonindustrie en implementeren deze in Nederland en Belgi en ook veelvuldig internationaal Wereldwijd werken er 600 medewerkers aan het succes van het bedrijf, waarbij Nederland met een team van 30 medewerkers opereert als het centrum van de Europese activiteiten 100 Talent is voor hen in de regio Rotterdam op zoek naar een, , SUPPORT  PROJECT ENGINEER MBOHBO  Rotterdam waarbij naast mediors ook starters worden uitgenodigd te reageren, , Nog iets meer over de organisatie, , Onze opdrachtgever heeft ruim 40 jaar ervaring in de automatisering van betonmortel en betonfabrieken en heeft in de Nederland en Belgi ruim 300 verschillende fabrieken voorzien van geautomatiseerde systemen Van truckplanning tot en met product controle, van elektroschakelkast tot en met de productiebesturing van een fabriek of centrale Daarnaast is men actief in industrien met raakvlakken met de betonindustrie, zoals cement, asfalt en zand  grind, , Wat is jouw rol van Support  Project Engineer, , Naast project managers, developmentteam en de servicedesk zal het team waar je als Support  Project Engineer direct mee samenwerkt bestaan uit Directeur Sales, Project Engineers, Marketing Project Manager EMEA en de Manager EMEA Business Strategy and RD Je rapporteert aan 1 van beide service managers Jij mag je vastbijten in industrile automatiseringsprojecten, waarbij de supportkant bestaat uit helpdesk en onsite activiteiten bij de klant, om storingen te verhelpen of om wijzigingen door te voeren Hierbij kan je uiteraard terugvallen op een 2e en 3e lijns ondersteuning door jouw collegas De automatiseringsprojecten bereid je voor op kantoor door de fabriek te configureren en simuleren Visualisatie en softPLC zijn daarbij dagelijkse begrippen Je werkzaamheden gaan van implementatie tot support Jij bent ervoor verantwoordelijk om de klant op alle gebieden zo goed mogelijk te ondersteunen, zonder het commercile belang van je eigen bedrijf uit het oog te verliezen Na ervaring en doorgroei ga je processen steeds verder zelfstandig en compleet aanpakken Dit zal dan uiteindelijk gaan van pretechnical sales, afstemming met de klant en implementatie tot en met de formele oplevering De klanten bevinden zich hoofdzakelijk binnen de BeNeLux, maar ook in toenemende mate daarbuiten zoals de UK en US, , Wat breng jij hiervoor mee, , Je denkt en werkt aantoonbaar op HBO niveau en hebt een technische MBO of HBO opleiding met succes afgerond Werkervaring in een soortgelijke functie een pr, maar ook ambitieuze starters worden uitgenodigd om te solliciteren Werkervaring binnen de beton of procesindustrie is zeker een pr Je bent in staat ingewikkelde knelpunten in een geautomatiseerde elektronische installatie snel te herkennen en op te lossen Je bent praktisch en in staat om zelfstandig te werken en snel te schakelen Je beschikt over een goede beheersing van het Nederlands en je Engels is ruim voldoende Je vindt het interessant om op termijn veel onderweg te zijn in binnen en buitenland, en soms lange en flexibele werktijden zijn voor jou ook geen probleem, , Wat krijg jij hiervoor terug, , Je komt in een pragmatisch bedrijf waarbij alles staat in het teken van het houden en krijgen van tevreden klanten De organisatiestructuur is plat en de communicatielijnen kort De sfeer is open en informeel Bovendien is er veel ruimte voor zelfontplooiing en is men oprecht genteresseerd in jouw nieuwe ideen Als medewerker van een enthousiast Sales en Marketing team zal je verantwoordelijk worden voor je eigen werkgebied en krijg je de ruimte om je functie vorm te geven, jij bepaalt voor een groot deel je eigen toekomstige positie Je ontvangt een prima salaris plus 13e maand en goede secundaire voorwaarden waaronder auto, telefoon, bonus en pensioenregeling Het betreft een zelfstandige en veelzijdige functie binnen een groeiend bedrijf met een goede marktpositie en met een gedreven team van mensen Wij vertellen je er graag meer over, , Wat doen wij voor jou, , Onze opdrachtgever heeft, , 100 Talent gevraagd om de werving en selectieprocedure te verzorgen voor deze vacature Wij volledig gespecialiseerd in Werving  Selectie voor functies in technische en commercieeltechnische omgevingen Onze Talent Recruiters zijn door hun expertise en jarenlange relevante werkervaring altijd in staat de voor jou meest ideale werkgever te vinden Wij hebben onze dienstverlening afgestemd op jouw carrire Het succes van de werkgever valt of staat met jouw kennis, ervaring, inzet en ambitie En om dat succes te behalen zorgen wij voor plaatsing van het beste Talent bij onze opdrachtgevers

Job Title: Content Marketing Manager - Flexible Office Homeoffice Remote
Location: RotterdamThe Hague metropolitan area, South Holland, Netherlands
Job Description: We are looking for a talented Content marketing manager to take full responsibility of our inbound marketing strategies including social media, blogs and lead generation, , Our ideal candidate is a creative marketing professional, preferably with a writing background, , You should be able to develop engaging content to attract and retain customers, , For this position, its also essential to be uptodate with new technologies and marketing trends, , Ultimately, you should be able to expand our companys digital footprint and brand awareness, , , , , Share content through various channels, ensuring strong web presence, , Design content marketing strategies and set shortterm goals, , , Develop editorial calendar, delegate tasks and ensure deadlines are met, , , , , Editorial mindset with an ability to predict audience preferences, , Hands on experience with SEO and web traffic metrics, , , Excellent communication and writing skills in English

Stage Marketing  Communicatie, , Word jij blij van duidelijke webteksten schrijven, content uitwerken voor sociale media, nieuwsbrieven en commercile mailingen Ben jij lekker creatief en kan jij samen met onze DTP afdeling super mooie productfolders ontwikkelen Heb jij interesse in de Customer Journey en wil jij als afstudeer onderzoek onze totale klantcommunicatie onder de loep nemen Dan is deze stage iets voor jou, , , , Per februari 2021 zoeken wij voor onze afdeling Marketing  Communicatie een stagiaire Tijdens deze stage werk je direct samen met de senior communicatieadviseurs en product marketing managers en ga je deel uitmaken van het marketingcommunicatieteam van NoordWest Europa, , , Onderwerpen die spelen waarin jij een ondersteunende rol hebt of zelfstandig werkzaam voor bent zijn, , , Jouw kritische blik en initiatieven worden hierin zeer gewaardeerd, , , , Je bent studerende in een studierichting met duidelijk connectie met marketing of communicatie maar ook opleidingen uit de agrarische sector, commercile economie of journalistiek sluiten we natuurlijk niet uit, , , , , , , Stagelopen bij Royal Agrifirm Group, dat is leren en werken bij een toonaangevend innovatieve organisatie Als stagiair maak je kennis met de werkwijze van Royal Agrifirm Group, word je intensief begeleid en heb je de mogelijkheid om brede ervaring op te doen Je krijgt je eigen taken en verantwoordelijkheden om goed te kunnen ervaren hoe het is om bij Royal Agrifirm Group te werken, , Wij bieden een stagevergoeding van  350,00 bruto per maand op basis van 40 uur per week Je komt in een enthousiast en betrokken team waar samenwerking en resultaat centraal staan Standplaats is Apeldoorn, , , , De visie van Agrifirm is om elke dag te werken aan een verantwoorde voedselketen voor toekomstige generaties Wij willen ervoor zorgen dat we iedereen betaalbaar, gezond en duurzaam voedsel kunnen blijven aanbieden Agrifirm levert daarom kwalitatief hoogstaande producten als diervoeders, producten voor de teelt van gewassen en professioneel advies, , Agrifirm is circa 120 jaar geleden opgericht in Nederland en is nu een toonaangevende, agrarische coperatie met een internationaal netwerk van dochterbedrijven gevestigd in 16 landen in Europa, ZuidAmerika en Azi en een wereldwijd distributienetwerk Het hoofdkantoor is gevestigd in Apeldoorn en met ruim 3000 betrokken medewerkers werkt Agrifirm iedere dag aan een gezonde toekomst voor boer n maatschappij, , , Voor meer informatie kun je contact opnemen met Laura Oosterbroek, Communicatie Adviseur Plantaardig, via loosterbroekagrifirmcom of LinkedIn httpswwwlinkedincominlauraoosterbroek, , Solliciteren kan via onze website of andere portals graag via de sollicitatiebutton Je reactie CV en motivatie kan je richten aan Laura Oosterbroek, , , , Bij Royal Agrifirm Group zijn we gepassioneerd door landbouw We willen het verschil maken, zorgen voor de toekomst en ambitieuze doelen halen Samen kunnen we de beste zijn en wereldwijd relevante impact creren Bij Agrifirm werk je mee aan een verantwoorde voedselketen voor de toekomstige generaties

Job Purpose, , The permanent role has been created to provide pre and postsales support for the Molecular Devices Advanced Workflow and Engineering solutions team This includes automation hardware and software, as well as customization of existing product lines The post will support our products across Western Europe The work will also involve method development and applications support work based in the UK laboratories or onsite at customer facilities, technical support and troubleshooting, and the generation of scientific literature, , , , Customers and colleagues, both internally and externally, throughout Molecular Devices and the wider Danaher Corporation Technical Support and Field Service teams Sales and Marketing colleagues, , , , Provide high level support to existing and potential customers Support Account Managers on sales calls to customer facilities to provide technical and applications assistance in response to customer enquiries Perform product demonstrations and support evaluations in the field through onsite visits or inhouse evaluations Prepare and present seminars to customers and potential customers Provide indepth applications training to customers at their facilities Assist in the management and maintenance of European demonstration equipment and coordination of the demonstration timetable Report on activities in the field on a regular basis to line manager and sales management as requested Perform sample workups and testing of customer samples in the UK laboratories Assist in the development of new applications and methodologies in conjunction with customers and colleagues Report on technical trends by relating customer and competitor feedback to appropriate people within the company and help in generating marketing materials when required Provide technical training for account managers to develop technical selling strategies vs competition and traditional technologies Provide reports on new product capabilities and acceptance when required General support of other products if required training on such products will be provided when necessary Perform other general duties as assigned Takes responsibility for personal development and understanding competitive markets Be aware of Health and Safety and conduct yourself in a way that does not put you or any other person at risk, , , , The jobholder should possess the qualifications, experience and skills set out below to meet the requirements of the role as well as embrace the Danaher Values, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , The above reflects the present requirements of the post As duties and responsibilities change and develop this will be reviewed and be subject to amendments, , Danaher like Philadelphia Cream Cheese, Kraft Peanut Butter, Kraft Dinner and Heinz Ketchup Others are fast growing new sensations that defy status quo like CRAVE No matter the brand, we are united under one commitment with Rise Against Hunger And we also stand committed to sustainability, and the health of our planet and its people, , Every day, we are transforming the food industry with bold thinking and unprecedented results If youre passionate like us  and ready to create the future, build on a storied legacy, and participate as a conscientious global citizen  theres one thing to do, , , , Were not afraid to think differently Embrace new ideas Dream big It all comes down to the way we empower our people to own their work Its true Our employees are our competitive advantage, , As part of the Kraft Heinz family youre supported to grow and achieve Youre recognized and rewarded for outstanding performance at every level Youre given the opportunity to leave your mark and build legacies But you wont do it alone This is where our values and teamwork thrives and collaborative spirit fuels every day, , , , We have an excellent opportunity for an enthusiastic BachelorMaster student who is interested in making a difference in Sales at Kraft Heinz, , , , Depending on your profile, your experience and interests, as well as the expertise of our Sales leadership, you will be supporting one 625 euro per month 40hrs, 5 days  full reimbursement of travel expenses, , Amsterdam, Antwerp, , Become a part of a close intern community as well as a young and ambitious work environment including online, , As a Kraft Heinz intern youll be the owner of your own projects and especially of your own career At Kraft Heinz, we provide the playing field You change the game , , , , , , Like any other , , For any questions regarding these positions or the recruitment process, please feel free to contact, , , , VeraZwikkerkraftheinzcom, Amsterdam

About The Job, , As a principal researcher, you define and drive the understanding of customers  and the future of travel experiences across one or more business units You partner with our teams to understand guests and partners  and how we can improve their experiences You identify and shape product strategy and inspire crossfunctional partners on improvements and new products You provide thought leadership and mentoring to more junior researchers who are the keys to wellinformed, objective, dataoriented decision making across Bookingcom accommodation business, , In this role, you will define and guide research processes, mentor your teammates and partner with multidisciplinary product teams to identify customer needs and develop insights for product development, , You are a strong and empathetic partner within the research craft community You are an excellent communicator and will partner closely with senior stakeholders and the leadership team, , You bring expertise in research practices across all phases of the product lifecycle, excellent knowledge of primary research methods surveys, diary studies, interviews and focus groups as well as secondary  expert methods such as litreviews, cognitive walkthroughs and desk research You will define and lead research programs that influence the customer proposition, align UX research activities with wider plans and build user centred practices in product teams

Company Description, , Easygenerator empowers organizations to unlock and share their knowledge online We do this by simplifying and accelerating their learning development At Easygenerator, we offer validated learning tools combined with unparalleled personalized support, , We are growing approximately 100 per year It is our ambition to become the global category leader in our industry To realize our ambitious goals we are looking for a Revenue Operations Specialist to join our Sales department and startup, , , , We are looking for an analytical and proactive Revenue Operations Specialist to support and enable our revenue team to focus on the customer You will be reporting directly to our Chief Revenue Officer and will be working closely together with our department managers, , In this position you will be working on four pillars operations, tooling, data and enablement for our revenue departments  marketing, sales, business development and customer success The managers of these departments will be your customers and managing the flow of information, expectations and communication is key You should be an excellent stakeholder manager, understand how and where to communicate with whom and ensure that you pitch suggestions and improvements based on your findings, , Diving into the data to create reports, track results and try to understand which things are going well and which arent and creating suggestions and improvements based on your findings, , Guaranteeing a smooth daytoday for our revenue team and their processes and continuously working on improving them, , Ensuring that all managers and team members have the right resources to be successful This can be trainings on specific topics, sharing best practices, onboarding and training new employees in the revenue team etc, , Manage our existing tools such as our CRM Salesforce and always be on the lookout for improvements within those tools or new tools that could make things easier and more efficient, , , , , Additional Information, , , , , , , Feel free to submit your application right away If you have any questions, you can ask Amelie amelieeasygeneratorcom or send her a message on LinkedIn

Job Title: Inside Account Executive, Belux (French and Dutch speaking)
Job Description: We are looking for an Inside Account Executive to drive our technology and superserve our customers If you have a passion for technology and an interest in how it can impact large businesses we want to talk with you, , Youll drive the entire sales process from start to finish, including opportunity identification, introductory meetings, product demonstration and evaluation, customer QA, as well as negotiation and closing, , You will be joining a unique team People who succeed at Nutanix have a sense of urgency, a lot of initiative, a commitment to customer success, and enthusiasm about pushing the edge as well as a sense of humor We provide interesting work, great products, new things to learn, and the freedom to make the job work the way you like it, , Together, we will create the next iconic technology company and do extraordinary things So, if you are ready to do your best work and grow your career, come and join us, , , , Nutanix EMEA Inside Sales team is responsible for accelerating revenue growth This team is exposed to supporting functions like sales, marketing, channel and support within the organization as well as Nutanix customers, partners, distributors and alliances This team of 100 individuals is spread over the different hubs in EMEA, and consist of Sales Development Representatives, Inside Account Executives and Inside Channel Account Managers The teams unique vibe comes from the constant creativity, innovation and focus on how we can better serve our customers every time The EMEA Inside Sales team is a talent pool for other functions in the company, it is the ideal opportunity to get to know the Nutanix portfolio and accelerate your career, , , , , , , Does this sound like you Lets talk, , , , Founded in 2009 and headquartered in San Jose, California, Nutanix is a passionate team of 6000 employees worldwide Our people we call ourselves Nutants are the heartbeat of LifeAtNutanix and one of the many things that Ben jij op zoek naar een uitdagende meewerkstage in een gedreven commercieel team Dan maakt Lidl graag kennis met jou Er zijn verschillende opdrachten beschikbaar waar jij je tanden in kunt zetten en zelfstandig mee aan de slag kunt gaan Jouw stage staat bol van de leermomenten Je ervaart hoe het is om bij een professionele en internationale organisatie te werken en krijgt volop verantwoordelijkheden Door de verschillende werkzaamheden in deze stage ga je met veel mensen en afdelingen samenwerken, dit geeft de stage een erg afwisselend karakter, , , , , , , , Geen dag is hetzelfde, vandaag loop je mee met Omar onze micro marketing verantwoordelijke, want er gaat een nieuw filiaal open en morgen ondersteun je Joost, onze manager verkooporganisatie met het maken van analyses op kantoor Vervolgens belt een van onze managers verkoop je om te vragen of je een audit wilt lopen in een van onze filialen, natuurlijk zeg je ja, je springt in de auto en rijdt naar het filiaal Als je denkt dat je dag er bijna op zit bedenk je je dat er nog een uitnodiging voor de rayonmanagers bijeenkomst verstuurd moet worden Je controleert hem en verstuurd hem naar alle managers Zo je dag zit erop, morgen mag je weer aan de slag en je kijkt er naar uit, , Je volgt een HBO studie in de richting van Marketing, Retail, Bedrijfskunde of Commercile Economie en zoekt een uitdagende meelwerkstage Je bent enthousiast, integer, dienstverlenend, kritisch, proactief en een teamspeler Daarbovenop beschik je over goede analytische vaardigheden en ben je enorm gericht op kwaliteit, , Verder ben je beschikbaar voor 24 tot 40 uur en zoek je een stage voor minimaal 4 maanden, langer mag natuurlijk altijd

Company Description, , At Palo Alto Networks everything starts and ends with our mission Being the cybersecurity partner of choice, protecting our digital way of life We are a company built on the foundation of challenging and disrupting the way things are done, and we are looking for innovators who are as committed to shaping the future of cybersecurity as we are, , , , , , At Palo Alto Networks everything starts and ends with our mission, , Being the cybersecurity partner of choice, protecting our digital way of life, , We have the vision of a world where each day is safer and more secure than the one before These arent easy goals to accomplish  but were not here for easy Were here for better We are a company built on the foundation of challenging and disrupting the way things are done, and were looking for innovators who are as committed to shaping the future of cybersecurity as we are, , , , Our methodology is first class support Weve been recognized for it as an industry leader and were dedicated to continuing this standard In this role, you will work with our technical account managers to personalize our customers experience You will learn your clients business objectives in and out within their technical environment and focus on mitigating risks and resolving any technical issues in their networks Youre close to the deployment of cybersecurity solutions  and we need you to recognize risks before they arise You get a thrill from seeking out complex issues and find their resolutions  and you dont wait for those issues to be escalated from our clients Instead, you find them Youll be working hand in hand with our developers to reproduce the issues you find and develop permanent solutions to prevent them in the future, , , , , , , , Additional Information, , , , Our technical support team is critical to our success and mission As part of this team, you enable customer success by providing support to clients after they have purchased our products Our dedication to our customers doesnt stop once they sign  it evolves As threats and technology change, we stay in step to accomplish our mission, , Youll be involved in implementing new products, transitioning from old products to new, and will fix integrations and critical issues as they are raised  in fact, youll seek them out to ensure our clients are safely supported We fix and identify technical problems, with a pointed focus of providing the best customer support in the industry, , , , Were trailblazers that dream big, take risks, and challenge cybersecuritys status quo Its simple we cant accomplish our mission without diverse teams innovating, together, , We are committed to providing reasonable accommodations for all qualified individuals with a disability If you require assistance or accommodation due to a disability or special need, please contact us at email protected, , Palo Alto Networks is an equal opportunity employer We celebrate diversity in our workplace, and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex including pregnancy, sexual orientation, or other legally protected characteristics

forms, create and followup on minutesand Project reporting and evaluation reporting program status, communication to project team, sponsors and related parties Order to be successful in your role you character, who is proactive and t to contribute in a fastpaced, growth company someone with excellent communication  collaboration skills, whos exible with a positive outlook, , , , A challenging role at the heart of an international organization with growth potential, development opportunities and good working conditions You will be working for a strongly developing family company selling its products and brands across various markets in Europa and beyond

committed ship date and delivery conditions andor mitigating issues that impact commitment andor revenue recognition, ,  initiate shipment preparation process and coordinate with warehouse and shipping group for timely shipping of customer orders, ,  first point of contact at Manufacturing Eindhoven for mitigating issues related to installation issues at customer site MOAs, DOAs, etc, , for all SSD regions of FEI on various issues related to Configuration and Order Fulfillment in a broad concept, ,  Responsible to initiate and support Continuous improvement, , , , The successful Job Description: Krijg jij energie van het werken in een multidisciplinair specialisten team, Vind jij het belangrijk om vanuit de data te werk te gaan om de ultieme mailings op te zetten, , , , , Met een rijke cultuur en achtergrond binnen verschillende mediakanalen en platformen, is dit een van de meest bekende en toonaangevende spelers in de  En dat niet alleen in Nederland, , Zelf zal je onderdeel worden van de afdeling  een team van 6 en nog een  Samen vormen jullie een die zich inzet voor de optimale experience en retentie voor alle B2C merken en platformen Met een dagelijks bereik in de miljoenen, zal je geen tekort hebben aan afwisseling in campagnes en labels, , , , Vanuit het B2C Data team ben jij, samen met een directe Campaign Development collega, verantwoordelijk voor het bedenken, opzetten en implementeren van data gedreven , , Om voor de beste klant experience te zorgen, schakel jij vaak met je analisten collegas, om net dat stukje te kunnen gaan Waar haakt iemand af Waarom Wat kan jij hieraan doen Waar staat deze lezer op te wachten, , Vanuit jouw specialisatie ben jij een belangrijke binnen je eigen team, maar ook voor marketing collegas op andere afdelingen maar ook journalisten en project managers, , Ook is het aan jouw om de technische kant van te beheren en waar jij mogelijkheden hiervoor ziet Hiervoor heb jij ook de ondersteuning van een externe ter beschikking

Job Title: Data Science Insights & Team Lead - Mobile App Marketing
Job Description: It was not so long ago that booking a trip to see the Eiffel Tower, stroll down New Yorks iconic Madison Avenue or feel the sand between our toes on Copacabana Beach was simply a matter of a few taps on our smartphone, , In fact, thats what we do at Bookingcom We make it easier for everyone to experience the world And while that world might feel a little farther away right now, were busy preparing for when the world is ready to travel once more, , , , , , Marketing department is looking for a savvy data scientist manager to join our team of data scientists, software engineers, designers and marketers You will have the opportunity to lead a team of data scientists and analysts to build data products that will influence the direction the App Marketing team is taking in advertisement, app lifecycle tracking and increasing the value our mobile app provides to customers, , In this team you will leverage the fields of machine learning, experimental design and business analysis to build the worlds best travel mobile app, , , , , , , , , , , This position is open to worldwide candidates We provide assistance for you and your family with a generous relocation package, ensuring a smooth transition to working and living in Amsterdam We have successfully relocated 300 technology professionals to Amsterdam in the last year

Company Description, , At Palo Alto Networks everything starts and ends with our mission Being the cybersecurity partner of choice, protecting our digital way of life We are a company built on the foundation of challenging and disrupting the way things are done, and we are looking for innovators who are as committed to shaping the future of cybersecurity as we are, , , , , , At Palo Alto Networks everything starts and ends with our mission, , Being the cybersecurity partner of choice, protecting our digital way of life, , We have the vision of a world where each day is safer and more secure than the one before These arent easy goals to accomplish  but were not here for easy Were here for better We are a company built on the foundation of challenging and disrupting the way things are done, and were looking for innovators who are as committed to shaping the future of cybersecurity as we are, , , , Our methodology is first class support Weve been recognized for it as an industry leader and were dedicated to continuing this standard In this role, you will work with our technical account managers to personalize our customers experience You will learn your clients business objectives in and out within their technical environment and focus on mitigating risks and resolving any technical issues in their networks Youre close to the deployment of cybersecurity solutions  and we need you to recognize risks before they arise You get a thrill from seeking out complex issues and find their resolutions  and you dont wait for those issues to be escalated from our clients Instead, you find them Youll be working hand in hand with our developers to reproduce the issues you find and develop permanent solutions to prevent them in the future, , , , , , , , Additional Information, , , , Our technical support team is critical to our success and mission As part of this team, you enable customer success by providing support to clients after they have purchased our products Our dedication to our customers doesnt stop once they sign  it evolves As threats and technology change, we stay in step to accomplish our mission, , Youll be involved in implementing new products, transitioning from old products to new, and will fix integrations and critical issues as they are raised  in fact, youll seek them out to ensure our clients are safely supported We fix and identify technical problems, with a pointed focus of providing the best customer support in the industry, , , , Were trailblazers that dream big, take risks, and challenge cybersecuritys status quo Its simple we cant accomplish our mission without diverse teams innovating, together, , We are committed to providing reasonable accommodations for all qualified individuals with a disability If you require assistance or accommodation due to a disability or special need, please contact us at email protected, , Palo Alto Networks is an equal opportunity employer We celebrate diversity in our workplace, and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex including pregnancy, sexual orientation, or other legally protected characteristics

Creating beautiful, interactive experiences for Digital Engagement tools in a greenfield product area, Alongside endtoend UIUX Product Design, youll be working in a small but growing team of designers, leading ideation, prototyping, user testing and detailed design across the full lifecycle, , , , , , , , , , This is an exciting new position and product area for Backbase Fintech is one of the hottest markets at the moment and there is enormous scope for talented UIUX designers to greatly improve user experiences for our customers, This job will be rich in design challenges We are building a new tool to support the future of digital marketing ensuring banks can engage with their customers across all channels in a more automated, personalized way If you love transforming complex concepts, information and data into simple, beautiful UIUX then this is the perfect role for you, Youll be a critical member of the team, working directly with the Product Managers, Research and Developer Leads to design beautiful, elegant experiences influencing the full product lifecycle from a user perspective Most importantly, you will be the voice of the user at Backbase Youll need to be passionate about understanding what Marketing teams at banks need, both now and in the future, We have a great, creative culture in the Design team with over 50 UIUX highly respected Designers and Researchers working across the organisation We are looking for someone who will be a great addition to this team, bringing creativity, passion and experience

Job Title: Associate Sales Development Representative, Amsterdam (Dutch Speaking)
Job Description: Job Description, , Not just a job, are you looking for a sales career This is your chance to build a successful career with Nutanix, , Join our elite Nutanix Sales academy, providing you solid ground for mentoring and developing your sales career, Since the inception of our Inside Sales team in EMEA over the last four years, we were able to develop and promote a number of talent from joining our sales academy to territory account managers and Global account managers across the field, , We are searching for a hungry, honest and humble Sales Development Representative SDR to drive our technology and superserve our customers, , , , Nutanix EMEA Inside Sales team is responsible for accelerating revenue growth This team is exposed to supporting functions like sales, marketing, channel and support within the organization as well as Nutanix customers, partners, distributors and alliances This team of 100 individuals is spread over the different hubs in EMEA, and consist of Sales Development Representatives, Inside Account Executives and Inside Channel Account Managers The teams unique vibe comes from the constant creativity, innovation and focus on how we can better serve our customers every time The EMEA Inside Sales team is a talent pool for other functions in the company, it is the ideal opportunity to get to know the Nutanix portfolio and accelerate your career, , , , , , , , , , , Does this sound like you Lets talk, , , , Founded in 2009 and headquartered in San Jose, California, Nutanix is a passionate team of 6000 employees worldwide Our people we call ourselves Nutants are the heartbeat of LifeAtNutanix and one of the many things that makes Nutanix a great place to work at We share an intellectual curiosity, a bias for action, and an obsession for our customers We are builders and problem solvers with an entrepreneurial spirit Above all, we celebrate what makes each of us unique, , We are humbled to be recognized as one of Bloombergs Top 50 Companies to Watch in 2020 and one of the Fortune 100 Best Companies to Work For 2020 , , Were growing fast and disrupting the computing industry Join us and make your mark, , , , Nutanix is a global leader in cloud software and a pioneer in hyperconverged infrastructure solutions, making computing invisible anywhere Companies around the world use Nutanix software to leverage a single platform to manage any app, at any location, at any scale for their private, hybrid and multicloud environments, , , , Nutanix is an Equal Employment Opportunity and in the US an Affirmative Action employer Qualified applicants are considered for employment opportunities without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, disability status or any other category protected by applicable law We hire and promote individuals solely on the basis of qualifications for the job to be filled, , We strive to foster an inclusive working environment that enables all our Nutants to be themselves and to do great work in a safe and welcoming environment, free of unlawful discrimination, intimidation or harassment, , As part of this commitment, we will ensure that persons with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodations If you need a reasonable accommodation, please let us know by contacting hrnutanixcom
